reviews.text: This is a reasonably good, new, business-type hotel, but pretty isolated, just off a motorway, with nothing nearby. The rooms are good sized, but with a glass shower cabinet to one side, and no other seperation between the sleeping area and bathroom area. The restaurant is a little expensive for what it is, and my steak was accompanied by frozen french fries. If you are on business in the area, and have a car, this is not a bad place to stay.
reviews.title: Good hotel, not so good location
